titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that secondary schools should consider starting school after 9:00 in the morning.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Education Reform.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 6/30/2005--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that secondary schools should begin classes after nine o'clock in the morning.
